title: Wild Australasia [DVD] (A)

abstract: Wild Australasia (prod. Neil Nightingale, 50 min.)--Desert heart (prod. Jeni Clevers, 50 min.)--Southern seas (prod. Hugh Pearson, 50 min.)--Gum Tree Country (prod. Mary Summerill, 50 min.)--Island Arks (prods. Neil Nightingale & Hugh Pearson, 50 min.)--New Worlds (prod. Mary Summerill, 50 min.)--Wildlife on one: possums, tales of the unexpected (prod. Karen Bass, 1996, 30 min.)--Penguin Paradise (prod. Hugh Pearson, 2002, 10 min.)
description: Wonderful aerial photography of the Australian landscape entices the viewer to voyage with the filmmakers across the continent. A six part television series on wildlife co-produced by the BBC/ABC and narrated by Matt Day. Landscapes, flora and fauna of Australia and parts of New Zealand are explored. Deserts, coral reefs, islands, forests and cities and the unique nature of wildlife in Australasia are portrayed in great, colourful detail. Extras include two bonus documentaries on penguins and possums.
